Updates an existing LOAN transaction with new details.

**Updatable fields:**
- Title, amount, currency, transaction date
- Payer
- Obligations (users and amounts)

**Important notes:**
- Only LOAN transactions can be updated
- Currency can be changed (e.g., from JPY to USD)
- All existing obligations will be replaced with new ones

description.content: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

Triggered by AWS EventBridge + Lambda to update daily exchange rates.

**Authentication:** Requires X-API-Key header

**Flow:**
1. Lambda receives EventBridge trigger (daily at 00:01 UTC)
2. Lambda calls this endpoint
3. System fetches LATEST rates from external API
4. Rates are saved/updated in database with current date

**Request Body:** Not required
